short_summary: The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) has led prevention and preparedness activities to manage African Swine Fever (ASF).
description: A residual risk was identified from pathways with a high level of uncertainty, such as travelers inadvertently and illegally carrying pork products into Canada. A model is required to support risk assessments during times of preparedness as well during emergencies where a new country has been found to be infected with ASF so that adequate measures to mitigate this pathway can be implemented.
duration_in_months: While the exact duration time for the contract is not specified, it can be assumed that the contract will last for an unspecified amount of time.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: 1.7 Programmer/Analyst for the Canadian Food Inspection Agency**

### Tender Overview
The Canadian Food Inspection Agency (CFIA) is seeking proposals from qualified vendors to provide technical support for the development and implementation of a risk assessment model to estimate the likelihood of entry of African Swine Fever (ASF) and Classical Swine Fever (CSF) into Canada via air travelers.

### Tender Details
- **Reference Number:** CB-9230-28118097
- **Contract Number:** 2024-00192
- **Tender Closing Date:** October 6, 2023, 14:00 EST
- **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
- **Location:** National Capital Region (NCR)

### Tender Description
The CFIA requires a 1.7 Programmer/Analyst to provide technical support for the development and implementation of a risk assessment model for ASF and CSF. The model relies on data on international traveler routes accessible through BlueDot. The successful vendor will be responsible for finalizing the model’s development and implementation to support risk assessments during times of preparedness and emergencies.

### Evaluation Criteria
Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

### Contact Information
Alexander Lisowski, Contract Officer
Email: [Alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca](mailto:Alexander.lisowski@inspection.gc.ca)
Phone: (613) 285-6119

### Documents
- [Tender Notice (English)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9230/2024-00192-npp-english.pdf)
- [Tender Notice (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9230/2024-00192-npp-french.pdf)
